column4: has anyone experienced a shut-down malfunction after upgrading to Ubuntu 10.4?
or has anyone solved the problem of a malfunctioning shut-down/hibernation mode?
I want to swap notes ubottu
the problem is as i have stated it, my computer does not shut down when i enter 'shut down'
does the screen turn black but the machine doesn't power down?
more or less...the screen fades and is black but there is text on it saying that the order to kill was given
what i mean to say is does it go thru the motions of shutting down but bails out at the very end?
i used to have this problem with problem a long time ago ... not having it for the last few years
does it happen consistently or randomly?
what ubuntu are you using, and are you using windows or anything else with it? happening on yours?
do you want to have a dialogue on this?
yes...do you want to chat in a window?
